titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that all Chinese people, including the people of Taiwan, deserve to be represented in international institutions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

bill.summary: 3/18/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that it should be U.S. policy to support the representation of all Chinese people, including the people of Taiwan, in international institutions.
